attributes.long-description:
The hunt is on! Join the Ghosts in Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon® Predator, an action packed third-person shooter. Lead a squad of three Ghosts deep behind enemy lines in the jungles of Sri Lanka.

Sri Lanka 2015: The Ghosts have 72 hours to pave the way for a U.S. invasion force. As open conflict with Pakistan looms, the Ghosts uncover proof that they’ve been targeting the wrong enemy. Now they must act before falsified intelligence lures America into an unpredictable and devastating war.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

attributes.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon® Predator
